{{ celda }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { io } from 'socket.io-client'; import { SocketService } from 'src/app/socket.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'], }) export class HomeComponent { message: string = ''; public rows: number = 20; public cols: number = 20; private socket: any; public tablero: string[][] = [ [' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' '], [' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' '], [' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' '], [' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' '], [' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' '], [' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' '], [' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' '], ]; constructor(private socketService: SocketService) { } sendMessage() { this.socketService.sendMessage(this.message); this.message = ''; // Limpia el campo de entrada } ngOnInit() { this.socketService.onMessageReceived((message: string[][]) => { // Maneja los mensajes recibidos del servidor let newTablero console.log('Mensaje recibido:', message); this.tablero = message }); } }
